transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Uday ji se baat ho rahi hai na Urban Care se?
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: Haan Uday ji kaise hain aap? Very good evening. Main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Head aur Noida head office se bol rahi hu sir.
Customer: Hey Richa, good evening. Tell me Richa.
Executive: Haan Uday ji actually ye aapka na ek Sumit ke sath discussion chal raha tha leads ko leke sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Right? To sir aap nearby areas mein karte hain to we can see here ki aisa aapne bola ki jo bhi leads available hai wo aapke kaam ki nahi hai. Matlab lead available hi nahi hai jo aapko lead pick karni hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Right? Wo so location is the main problem. To jaise AP Andhra Pradesh se lead aati hai to aap What I was what I was promised is I told them this what my location is. You guys already know right when I registered my profile in the system, right? It given my I given my pin code and everything. When I told these guys, these guys said sir every day you are getting 20 30 request from your area within 30 kilometers 50 kilometers. So ek demo bhi diya. So they didn't show me the area and all that. So they close up the list of inquiries you are getting and all that. I said baba this is all force but I'm not interested for now because I know I'm not seeing any good leads coming down.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: They what is guys you guys are promised me sir ek kaam karte hain you pay it and baar baar call kar raha tha for last one year they keep calling every day. And what at last they told me sir if you're not getting good leads, you will reimburse your amount.
Customer: Maine aise sir socha if you not get good leads, we will return your amount.
Executive: Haan wo main bhi communicate yahi kiya tha. Even the mail I said okay that's the case communicate the same thing in email so that I have some evidence for that.
Customer: Haan sir can you share that email to me or to Sumit whom you were discussing this case before?
Customer: Sure sure baba. We'll do that. Can you drop me can you drop me your email ID?
Executive: Yes yes. I'll ask Sumit to do that and on that email you can you know paste that confirmation link for for the refund sir. Right?
Customer: Sure baba. Sir before haan aur bataiye sir aur kya baatein hui thi?
Customer: That's it see after that every day I'm trying but I'm getting leads from Jaipur, Maharashtra, Rajasthan and all that and Hyderabad. Hyderabad is seen 320 kilometers away from me. Even though I give for a free to a customer from my location, he still he won't accept it because of the logistics price.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: So that's why I said Okay.
Customer: You understood?
Executive: I understood. So because of transport issue and because right that location is too far you cannot deliver your product in those locations, right sir?
Customer: Exactly exactly.
Executive: Okay okay. So as I can see sir your I have opened your banner section and I was trying to check the leads but we have currently leads available you know for other locations. We do not have for your location sir.
Customer: Exactly wahi to bol raha hu. Yeah it's the same it's the same issue what I was facing.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: So 4th November ko aapka service sign hua tha. Today is 19 sir. To thoda sa wait kare sir ek baar check kare ki I can wait for one more month. I have no issue at all.
Customer: Hmm. But do is the justice for what was promised to me.
Executive: That refund.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay. Wo bola tha within one month I will take my amount back whatever I invested in IndiaMART. Okay. So is there you so you want lead only for Karnul sir, right?
Executive: Yeah yeah.
Executive: Karnul. Let me check sir how many leads we have but you know.
Executive: Hello. Yeah sir there is no such lead available sir.
Executive: Yeah.
Executive: Okay. I'll check sir what can be done and if we have to process this return refund payment then the amount will be deducted but so so we will refund the amount on prorate basis sir. So whatever we will refund the amount after deducting your running cost. So which running cost? So what for whatever period you have already used your service or your service is right we will deduct that amount and we will refund for the balance duration sir. No you are returning it but from day one I was telling that I'm not interested in rolling but you guys promised me it will be 100% reimbursement if I'm not getting any leads.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Now you're telling that it will be a running cost will be So this is the second time you are raising this issue. First time you raised this issue on 9th of November.
Customer: Yeah. Right after three to four days of your service activation sir. Because since I got email they said every day I will get even not even a single day I got any deal.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai. I'll check sir what can be done, right sir? Please baba. Yeah. Theek hai. Thank you sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund as promised earlier.

- Not getting leads from preferred location.



Resolution:

- Executive checked and no leads available.

- Refund will be processed on prorate basis.

- Executive will check what can be done.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and inform the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, leads, location, reimbursement
